segments.text: Mr . Emory ? I ’ d appreciate it if you would look over these letters before you leave today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d be glad to . Just leave them on my desk . I didn ’ t expect you to finish so soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , sir . I ’ ll leave them here . If there are no problems , I ’ ll mail them out this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1
